sentences.chinese: 鱼鳞病的发病因素是多方面的。

sentences.english: Reproduction of Tibetan monkeys troop in Yulingkeng of Huangshan Mountain wasseasonality, and it belongs to the birth rhythm pattern.
sentences.chinese: 黄山短尾猴鱼鳞坑群为季节性繁殖，属产仔节律型。

sentences.english: Key characteristics of the four main types of inherited ichthyosis are listed in the table below.
sentences.chinese: 四个继承下来的鱼鳞病主要类型的主要特点列于下表。

sentences.english: I got the fishmonger to skin the fish which helped save on the preparation time.
sentences.chinese: 我让鱼贩把鱼鳞刮了，这样准备烹制时能省点儿事。

sentences.english: The next morning, a mackerel sky hung over Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早上，东京的上空飘起了鱼鳞云。
绝大部分的唇膏里都含有鱼鳞成分。

sentences.english: What have we got over here. We have all fish have scales.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们知道的，所有的鱼都有鱼鳞。

sentences.english: Ichthyosis occurs worldwide and affects people of all races.
sentences.chinese: 鱼鳞病在全球范围发生。

sentences.english: The jade slips somewhat resemble shining fish scales.
sentences.chinese: 玉片有点像闪耀的鱼鳞。

sentences.english: Castle peak drift of flashing like scales of bright spots.
sentences.chinese: 青山风吹草动，闪烁着鱼鳞似的亮点。

sentences.english: They are lamellar, x-linked, and epidermolytic hyperkeratosis forms of ichthyosis.
sentences.chinese: 他们是层状，X连锁，鱼鳞病及表皮角化的形式。

sentences.english: Most lipstick is partailly made of fish scales.
sentences.chinese: 大部分唇膏的部分原材料是鱼鳞。

sentences.english: Charr often have smaller scales than their relatives.
sentences.chinese: 雅鱼常有比他们亲戚更小的鱼鳞。

sentences.english: Some of these patients have a severe form known asictkyosis.
sentences.chinese: 一些病人症状比较严重，形成鱼鳞病。

sentences.english: The onset of IV is usually within one year after birth.
sentences.chinese: 寻常型鱼鳞病的发病通常在出生后一年之内就已开始。

definition: fish maw/a food dish made from the swim bladder of fish
fish head/fig. upright and unwilling to compromise
